subject: Fenway Park (Boston)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Every game at Fenway Park since May 15, 2003, has sold out, but the Boston Red Sox make a certain number of tickets available on the day of each game for fans who do not mind arriving early and standing in line.
snippet: Every game at Fenway Park since May 15, 2003, has sold out, but the Boston Red Sox make a certain number of tickets available on the day of each game for fans who do not mind arriving early and standing in line.
